h1.span: Welcome to our School District Website!

td.style: vertical-align: top;

span.br: The mission of Edcouch-Elsa I.S.D. is to produce responsible graduates who can compete confidently in a dynamic global society by providing an individualized, nurturing educational foundation that draws strength from our community's spiritual roots and rich cultural heritage as we face the challenge of the new millennium.

p.span: Students must take a photo picture of an assignment per week per subject of the ASSIGNMENT your teacher will record as a numerical grade for you weekly for each subject. Your teachers will let you know which assignment(s) will be for a recorded grade. Be sure to email your teachers if you have additional questions.

Attention Students:
Click here to read letter from our Superintendent Dr. Richard Rivera.
​

td.style: border: 1px solid rgb(0, 0, 0);

span.br:
New packets will be dispersed on Thursday, April 9th at each campus.
Please click here to view letter
​

td.style: border: 1px solid rgb(0, 0, 0); border-image: none;

tr.td:
Attention Parents:
As you are picking up your free lunch from the District, we welcome you to use the EEISD School building WiFi that is accessible by parking in front of all schools. The EEISD “Guest” account is readily available for use. Be aware that like all WiFi signals, the further away you are from the antennas, the weaker the signal. So stay as close as possible to the building. There is no password just click on the guest profile and you will have access to Filtered Internet. If you will be utilizing it, do not leave your vehicle for any reason. We will not unblock any websites that have no educational use.
Campus Administrators are working on checking out chromebooks to our students taking online coursework. If you are a Parent of an Edcouch-Elsa student in need of a device, please contact your campus principal via the emails listed at the end of this post. Include your name, contact information, and the reason why you need to check one out. Once you send the email request, your school principal will contact you with information as to when and where to pick up the device. There is a limited amount of devices and will be distributed on a first come first serve basis.
You will be responsible for the safe return of the device when told to do so.
RCR : Maricela Olivarez, maolivarez@eeisd.org
LBJ: Aminta Limas, alimas@eeisd.org
JFK: Criselda Martinez, crmartinez@eeisd.org
S. Garcia: Norma Layton, nlayton@eeisd.org
Truan JHS: Alfredo Aguilar, aaguilar@eeisd.org
EEHS: San Juanita Tijerina, sjtijerina@eeisd.org

td.style: border: 1px solid rgb(0, 0, 0); border-image: none;

strong.span: Attention Truan Jr High School Parents:

td.span:
Carlos F. Truan will distribute instructional packets to 7th & 8th gr. tomorrow March 26, 2020 from 11:00 am - 12:30 pm at Truan Jr High campus.
6th grade parents can pick up their instructional packets only at David Ybarra Academy tomorrow March 26, 2020 from 11:00 am - 12:30 pm.
Alfredo Aguilar
CFT Jr High Principal

td.style: border: 1px solid rgb(0, 0, 0); border-image: none;

span.span: Due to our recent health concerns pertaining to COVID-19 pandemic, our School District has chosen to adhere to all state and local safety requirements. As a result of our school’s closing until April 13, 2020 Edcouch-Elsa High School staff has compiled the following instructional lessons and resources that are available to all students...

div.div: Non Discrimination Policy Edcouch-Elsa ISD does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, or disability in providing education services, activities, and programs, including vocational programs, in accordance with Title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, as amended; Title IX of the Educational Amendments of 1972; section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, as amended. Póliza no Discriminatoria El Distrito Escolar de Edcouch-Elsa no discrimina sobre la base de raza, religion, color, origen nacional, sexo o discapacidad en el otorgamiento de actividades de servicios educativos y programas, incluyendo programas vocacionales de acuerdo con el titulo VI de la Ley de Derechos Civiles de 1964, enmendada; Titulo IX de las Enmiendas a la Educacion de 1972; Seccion 504 del Ley de Rehabilitacion de 1973 enmendada.
